dict.acceptation: 周末；星期六和星期日（或略长一点的）休息时间；

sent.orig: Tony's Busy Weekend month, Tony had a very busy weekend.
sent.trans: 托尼繁忙的周末上个月，托尼有一个非常繁忙的周末。

sent.orig: Oh, Tony! Recycling was last weekend! This weekend it's tree planting.
sent.trans: 噢，托尼！废品回收是在上周末！这个周末是植树。

sent.orig: It is a weekend again, one weekend is going to pass accomplished nothing in this week.
sent.trans: 又到周末了，一周就这样“庸庸碌碌”地过去了，真是无所作为啊！

sent.orig: B My weekend? I had a nice quiet weekend.
sent.trans: B我的周末？我度过了一个安静悠闲的周末。

sent.orig: This weekend I already advance lose a weekend study.
sent.trans: 这周去外地我已经落下一周末的功课了。
